plot: Wise cracking comic duo dissect contemporary buzzwords, phrases and issues with a blend of satiric word play, politically incorrect and off-beat existential humor.
plot_en: Wise cracking comic duo dissect contemporary buzzwords, phrases and issues with a blend of satiric word play, politically incorrect and off-beat existential humor.
plot_es: Wise cracking comic duo dissect contemporary buzzwords, phrases and issues with a blend of satiric word play, politically incorrect and off-beat existential humor.
title: Double Espresso
